text: Gary Richard Herbert (born May 7, 1947) is an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. In August 2009, Herbert became the 17th Governor of Utah. He left office on January 4, 2021. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American Latter Day Saints Category:Governors of Utah Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Utah
title: Gary Herbert
